info.label: You do not have valid parking IDs
info.message: Based on your personal information obtained from the Population Register Center, you can purchase a parking permit for the adjacent zones.

success.label: Your vehicle information is up to date
success.message: Based on the vehicle registration information (Traficom), your driving license is valid and you can purchase a parking permit for the attached vehicle. Low-emission vehicle for half price.

vehicleSelector.discount: I also want to get a 50% discount on other street parking when paying with parking apps. Read more.
vehicleSelector.emission: Low emission vehicle, emissions below {{emission}} COâ‚‚

shoppingCart.fromAssistiveText: The permit starts at 00:00 on the selected day.
shoppingCart.immediatelyAssistiveText: The permit will be valid as soon as the payment is confirmed.
shoppingCart.subTitle: Car detail
shoppingCart.fixedPeriodAssistiveText: The duration of the permit is 1-12 months.
shoppingCart.openEndedAssistiveText: The price of the parking permit and the right to receive the permit are reviewed and charged on a monthly basis. A valid permit and a card payment for an open ended contract requires the storage of card information for continuous charging.
shoppingCart.title: Select duration and start date

paymentOverview.notificationMessage: The parking permit is electronic and the parking control identifies a valid ID based on the registration number of your vehicle.
paymentOverview.discountMessage: You are eligible for reduced street parking with mobile apps when you pay.
